phrase: 把美好的回忆留在心中
english: Hold your beautiful memories in your heart
spanish: Guarda tus preciosos recuerdos en tu corazón

phrase: 她说了问题的两个方面
english: He talked about both sides of the problem
spanish: Él hablo de ambos lados del problema

phrase: 以上的问题都明白了嘛？
english: Do you understand all of the above questions?
spanish: Entiendes todas las preguntas de arriba?

english: The teacher asked the students hand in their homework
spanish: La maestra le pidió a los estudiantes entregar la tarea
Estos son los requerimientos del trabajo

english: The content of this book is difficult
spanish: El contenido de este libro es dificíl

phrase: 今天的会议内容是什么?
spanish: Cuál es el contenido de la junta de hoy?

english: Here is one sheet of paper
spanish: Aquí esta una hoja de papel

english: There's a newspaper on the table
spanish: Hay un periodico sobre la mesa

english: I only found out about this today
spanish: Apenas hoy me entere de esto

english: What kind of animal is it?
